name: 2016 Simulator
description:
IMPORTANT: GAME PASSWORD IS: 2016simulator

2016 Not Enough for you?

Want to simulate 2016 instead?

Here at Venomos, we wanted to do the exact same thing!

Features

- America's Political Race

- Brexit

- Global Warming

- ... and much more!

Even if you're not in the US (like us), you'll have a lot of fun playing this game and simulating many of the aspects of it. Enjoy!
